questions.question_stem: Suppose that the random variable X has support {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, .... }. For i in this set, the pmf is given by P(X = i) = 1/i - 1/(i+1). If we let Y = 1 if X ≤ 2 and 0 otherwise, what is P(Y = 0)?
questions.question_stem_html: Suppose that the random variable X has support {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, .... }. For i in this set, the pmf is given by P(X = i) = 1/i - 1/(i+1). If we let Y = 1 if X ≤ 2 and 0 otherwise, what is P(Y = 0)?
